sentences.en: Dust masks equipped with air filter were worn all time to limit the breathing of sawdust.
sentences.cn: 装备空气过滤器的灰尘假面具总是磨损的限制锯屑的呼吸.

sentences.en: Frost collected in the window corners like sawdust.
sentences.cn: 窗角边结了一层锯末般的白霜.

sentences.en: INFLUENCE OF MAIN PARAMETERS ON WOOD SAWDUST GASIFICATION IN SUPERCRITICAL WATER.
sentences.cn: 锯木屑在超临界水中气化制氢过程的主要影响因素.

sentences.en: Sawdust was scattered on the floor.
Sawdust was used as a hygienic floor covering.
sentences.cn: 锯屑曾被用来铺在地上保持地面清洁卫生。

sentences.en: Such problems can be minimized by use of densified ( pelletized ) sawdust.
sentences.cn: 这些问题都可以尽量减少对致密 ( 粒状使用 ) 木屑.

sentences.en: The loveliest doll in the last analysis is merely sawdust.
sentences.cn: 说到底,最可爱的布娃娃也只不过是锯末做成的.

sentences.en: The smell of sawdust and glue pervaded the factory.
sentences.cn: 工厂里弥漫着锯屑和胶水的气味。

sentences.en: The subject is as dry as sawdust.
They had been sawing; that was why they were covered in the sawdust.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在锯木头, 因此弄得满身都是锯末.

sentences.en: Using a small brush, he brushed away the fine sawdust.
sentences.cn: 他用一把小刷子刷掉细锯末。

sentences.en: We also ate the ox - hides which were under the mainyard, also sawdust and rats. "
sentences.cn: 我们还吃桅杆下的牛皮, 还吃锯屑和老鼠. ”

sentences.en: Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.
sentences.cn: 木屑和锯末可压制成板.

sentences.en: You mean the sawdust or the peat keeps the soil from puddling?
sentences.cn: 你是说锯末和泥炭可以防止土壤粘闭 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: very small pieces of wood that are left when you have been cutting wood
